title: wisdom
comment: The quality of knowledge, discernment and understanding characteristic of God himself. True wisdom, seen in the ministry of Jesus Christ, is a gift of the Holy Spirit. Scripture affirms that true human wisdom is a gift from God and points out the folly of trusting in mere human wisdom.

children.title: wisdom, nature of human
children.comment: The human quality which enables the planning and successful achievement of a desired goal. It may be expressed as technical skill, practical instruction and astuteness in political affairs. True wisdom includes spiritual discernment and, above all, the reverence and knowledge of God.

seealsos.comment: craftsmanship and design in metalwork, stone, wood, embroidery and weaving

children.title: Wisdom as instruction in practical living
Wisdom expressed in a right relationship with God
Wisdom as reverent submission to God
Wisdom as the knowledge of God
Wisdom as obedience to God's command
Human wisdom can be opposed to God
wisdom, source of human
children.comment: True wisdom belongs to God and may be given by him alone. It cannot be received by those who put confidence in worldly wisdom which is based upon human cleverness and insight without God's revelation and which will come to nothing.

children.title: It is given by God alone
It is received through God's word
It is received through submission to God
It is imparted by God's Spirit
It is given in response to prayer
Worldly wisdom is foolishness to God
God cannot be known by worldly wisdom
Worldly wisdom builds pride and false hope
It is revealed in Jesus Christ

primaryrefs.comment: God's wisdom, which is hidden from those who rely on human wisdom, is the message of Christ crucified.

children.title: It is rejected by the worldly-wise
It is revealed to the unlearned

primaryrefs.comment: God's wisdom may be received only by those willing to give up all reliance on their own human insight and understanding.

children.title: It is revealed through the church
God-given wisdom is superior to worldly wisdom
wisdom, importance of human
children.comment: True wisdom may bring material reward but its value far exceeds earthly riches. To those who receive it, it opens a path to life and security and equips for leadership and right conduct.

children.title: The supreme value of true wisdom

primaryrefs.comment: The benefits of wisdom may include material prosperity, but more important is the moral and spiritual prosperity which it brings.
In Hebrew, the ``heart'' represents the centre of human personality.

children.title: Examples of those endowed with wisdom
